1.name: Naughty Duck
1.desc:
An ordinary duck that likes to cause trouble.
+100 points when repelled.

2.name: Bubble Duck
2.desc:
This duck wound up in the bubbles and found that it could use them as a shield. You'll have to teach it a lesson to get it to stop!
+600 points when repelled, grants 20 extra Rage.

3.name: Visitors
3.desc:
Don't hit the tourists!
-100 points when repelled.

4.name: Speedy Duck
4.desc:
This duck moves fast, so keep your eye on it!
+200 points when repelled.

5.name: Naughty Duck
5.desc:
An ordinary duck that likes to cause trouble.
+100 points when repelled, increases time remaining by 1s.

6.name: Bubble Duck
6.desc:
This duck wound up in the bubbles and found that it could use them as a shield. You'll have to teach it a lesson to get it to stop!
+600 points when repelled, increases time remaining by 3s, grants 20 extra Rage.

7.name: Visitors
7.desc:
Don't hit the tourists!
-100 points when repelled, reduces time remaining by 3s.

8.name: Speedy Duck
8.desc:
This duck moves fast, so keep your eye on it!
+200 points when repelled, increases remaining time by 1s.
